title: The Stonekeeper's Curse
description: A MYSTERIOUS WORLD FULL OF NEW ALLIES... AND OLD ENEMIES!Emily and Navin's mother is still in a coma from the arachnopod's poison, and there's only one place to find help: Kanalis, the bustling, beautiful city of waterfalls. But when Em, her brother, and Miskit and the rest of the robotic crew aboard the walking house reach the city, they quickly realize that seeking help is looking for trouble...dangerous trouble.
author: Kazu Kibuishi
